statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 35 \\ 10 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ -37 \\ -22 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
